statements.sql: select `pos_id`, `pos_title`, `pos_slug`, `pos_description`, `pos_image`, `pos_cat_id`, `pos_status`, `pos_rating`, `pos_view`, `pos_created_at`, `cat_id`, `cat_name`, `cat_slug` from `posts` inner join `categories` on `pos_cat_id` = `cat_id` where `pos_status` = 1 and `pos_slug` is not null and `cat_slug` is not null order by `pos_id` desc limit 5
